meanings.definition: The coldest season of the year, occurring between autumn and spring.
meanings.sent1: During wintertime, the snow covers everything in a white blanket.
meanings.sent2: I love to drink hot cocoa by the fireplace during wintertime.
meanings.sent3: The snowmen in our yard always seem to multiply during wintertime.
meanings.sent4: In wintertime, the world becomes a frozen wonderland.
meanings.sent5: The howling wind of wintertime sends shivers down my spine.

meanings.definition: The period of time during which winter lasts.
meanings.sent1: Our family always goes skiing together during wintertime.
meanings.sent2: Wintertime is when we celebrate holidays like Christmas and New Year's.
meanings.sent3: During wintertime, our cat loves to curl up by the heater.
meanings.sent4: The wintertime of our lives is when we truly appreciate warmth and love.
meanings.sent5: The wintertime of the year brings a sense of coziness and togetherness.
